runs.comm: starts with a widish delivery outside off, swinging away further and easy leave
this one comes into the batsman and Mustafa pushes it down towards mid-on, who's not too deep and Mustafa lazily completes the single. Lucky it wasn't a direct hit
swinging away from Kaleem with the angle, he lets it go
142kph, fuller and still pretty wide outside off, he drives this time and misses. Not much footwork
brings it closer to the off stump, with some late inswing, still wide enough to let it go
swings it away again pretty wide outside off, he chases this time and misses again
swings it into the left-hander and it was going down leg. Appeal turned down and they scamper for a leg bye. Very close run-out chance again, and no direct hit again
errs well down the leg side for a wide, not even close to the batsman
139kph, back of length now around off with a hint of outswing and Kaleem helps it to point easily
this one goes straighter from similar line and length and he defends it patiently
slightly wider outside off, some outswing and Kaleem helps it to third man. He's off the mark
opens up for a big shot, doesn't get the room and punches it into the covers
a wide to the left-hander as well. Down the leg side

first wicket! Afridi waits at mid-off for the catch as if he's watching a balloon in the sky. Doesn't move at all and pouches it easily. Mustafa charged down the track but the ball came in and rose on him from short of length, he slogged and got a top edge to mid-off
good speed at 143kph but it's well outside off with the angle and left alone
much better - on the stumps now but not much swing and Kaleem defends on the off side
angles it in, not much venom and Kaleem defends this one too

knocks the off stump! This one swings in from just about short of length from outside off, Kaleem barel moves his feet and doesn't account for the swing, leaves a gap between bat and pad while defending and the ball sneaks through to hit top of off
146kph, beats him straightaway outside off as he angles it away. He swings and misses
similar to the ball that got Kaleem, shapes it into the batsamn towards middle and off and he pushes it down to mid-off
length delivery on middle with the angle towards off, he pushes with an angled bat and gets an inside edge to the leg side. He's off the mark
fuller delivery outside off, tempts him to drive, which he does and is beaten
stifled appeal for lbw as it was going high and down leg. Pitched around middle and leg, swung in and cramped him for room
short of length now from leg, he pulls a bit awkwardly and gets one to mid-on
bit too full but it was the room that helped the batsman. He threw his bat outside off, almost going down on a knee and drives that through the covers for four
wide down the leg side now
138, has the angle and the bounce gets the top part of Shahzad's bat on its way to the keeper for an easy catch
that was going down leg or a wide but Anwar does well by flicking it fine down the leg side for a four. Needed only a bit of bat on that and he got it
angled towards the leg stump, tries to tuck it towards square leg but takes it on the pad
lovely outswing from Sami! Pitches it around length outside off, the batsman nearly poked and then withdrew just in time
straighter one on the off stump, just back of length, and he helps it to gully
tad outside off from back of length again, Shaiman goes on his toes and pushes it to point from the middle of the bat
towards the leg stump, tucked away off the pads but it's gone straight to square leg
back of length around middle, Usman hops in the crease and defends it back
nicely bowled just outside off, almost on the good length, and he leaves it for the keeper
tat bursts towards the batsman from short of length, had the angle too and nearly took the batsman's glove on the way
on the stumps this time, from good length, and he defends on the off side

gets the edge this time and it has so much bounce that it flies over the first slip! The batsman went on his toes while poking outside off, the ball rose on him and kept rising and rose over the slip too after taking the bat
keeps a bit low this time after pitching well outside off, left alone
turns it away a bit from outside off, pushed towards deep point for one
this one comes in dangerously, the batsman just about defends it back
too wide outside off and turning away further, he chases and gets a bottom edge that goes through the keeper for one
this one turns in now and hits him on the pad on the leg side
tosses it up on the stumps, pushed back to Afridi
flight again around the off stump, driven down with the turn to long-off
angles it into the stumps, helped with the angle to midwicket for one
from wide of the crease and towards off stump, blocked on the off side
fullish on the off stump now, pushed straight back to Nawaz
sorter this time towards off stump, no turn, and it's pushed gently towards long-on, just beating Nawaz's dive
full and down leg for a wide past the sweep

just over Shoaib Malik at long-off! He made room early, cleared the front foot and drove inside out with the spin to loft it just wide of long-off. Malik went to his left and tried to catch but it went over his hands and he had fallen over too
swept with the angle this time to deep square leg
on length around off, pushed into the covers
makes room but the ball chases him and he ends up defending into the covers
googly from outside off, he cut the ball playing for the legspinner and got an inside edge, not far from the off stump
oh beautiful legspinner to follow the googly. Flighted on middle, he leaned forward to block and was beaten by the turn
down the leg side now, goes off the keeper's pad to short fine leg. It was a wide too
helps it with the angle behind square on leg
tossed up around off, he leans forward a bit and blocks it
pretty wide outside off with some room, pushed down to long-off easily
shorter and sliding in, swept with the turn to deep square leg
nice length delivery on off, pushed gently into the covers for a quick single
bit more flight and fuller, driven down to long-off for one more
flighted and full on off, he leans into it and defends it to cover point
presses forward again and pushes the length delivery back to Nawaz
turning in a bit towards middle, pushed into the covers
he makes room, swings wildly outside off and misses. The ball rises and hits the keeper near the chin on the chest
looked like that was turning in, he swept it away to the leg side
shorter, wider and turning away, he chases without footwork and gets a bottom edge
flatter and quicker with the angle, traps him just about in front of leg and Afridi appeals confidently. Turned down as it was probably going down leg. Almost a run-out chance too after the appeal
top-edge this time and it's taken easily at short fine leg. It was fullish towards the leg side, he tried to sweep, got an edge to pop it to Nawaz
that's how you sweep it! It wasn't that full, was in front of the stumps, and he slammed it away over the midwicket boundary for a big six!
gets room, cuts it well outside off and gets a thick outside edge to beat short third man for four this time
length delivery around off, swept with the angle to short fine leg where Irfan dives to keep it to one
leans into it and flicks it with the spin to deep midwicket
fullish on the off stump, pushed down to the bowler
short and flat towards middle stump, he makes room and pushes it to cover point
loops it down the leg side with a googly for a wide
flighted on middle and leg, tucked off the pads towards midwicket
goes after it with hard hands and the ball turns away a bit, goes straight to point and through Umar Akmal's legs for four!
he's going after them! Makes room, gets a fullish delivery and slams it inside out to the covers for a one-bounce four!
goes down early on a knee to sweep that, gets a flatter one towards the leg stump and helps it through the aerial route to the fine-leg boundary. He knows where the gaps are
hard hands for the length delivery turning away and he finds sweeper cover but gets two with good running
tries to slam it through the covers by making room again, gets a thick edge to long-on
starts with a short ball right on the stumps, he tries to ramp it but misses
opens up this time to slam it with a pull, it was a short ball, but he misses again
he connects this time, it's a top-edge and it's gone very very high, and lands safely right before long-on and just beyond a running mid-on. Mid-on should have left it for long-on
Irfan gets the outside edge, gets the big wicket! Anwar made room but there was hardly any width, short of length delivery around middle made him poke and he only got an edge
welcomes him with a short ball, he pulls and misses first ball
slogs the length delivery from leg stump, gets a leading edge and that goes high over the slips for a four. Wonder if that shot was really required, but they'll take the runs
angles it down leg, just brushes the pad before gong behind square
bit of flight on middle and leg, clipped towards square leg for one
fullish delivery outside off with some room this time, he drives it square nicely and Umar Akmal slides to his right in the deep to keep it to two
slightly slower towards the leg stump, can't get bat on that one

too short, Usman pivots on the back foot and pulls it late, almost like a scoop, and it's going to the fine-leg fielder. There's Nawaz there, he jumps but it goes just over him. Felt like he could have caught that
good over for UAE - he goes on the back foot and cuts that nicely right in between point and short third man for four. Got room and made use of it
slogs the length delivery from outside off, gets an edge and that runs away fine on the off side to beat Irfan for four!
another top edge and it falls in no man's land again! He pulled the short ball, got an edge and it fell well short of long-on who was running in
good, short ball towards the ribs. Usman gets some glove on that to tuck it to fine leg. Hit his left glove, hope not too hard
mid-off is in, Javed opens up and slams it straight over mid-off for a one-bounce four. The pressure is mounting on Pakistan now as UAE reach 100
backs away, the experienced Sami bowls it full and wide outside his reach
doesn't move much this time to drive the fullish ball outside off but misses out
144kmh, starts with a bouncer outside off, just out of the batsman's reach
144kmh again, late and inswinging yorker, gets an edge towards deep backward square leg
short ball, he pulls and gets a top edge but it doesn't go too far. Only the batsman could have caught that himself
short ball again, this time with the angle, he pulls and misses
widish outside off this time, he swings and misses. Fourth dot ball of the over
opens up his stance, it's short with hardly any width and he can't connect again

short ball, he slam-pulls it down to long-on for one. Irfan was waiting for the throw right behind the stumps, the ball bounces just before the stumps and Irfan jumps just in time to let it through just under his crotch and over the stumps. Strange gap to go through for the ball
not in control, that was a top edge off a short ball and the pull gets him six! Goes well over the fine leg boundary
fuller and wider now, since square leg is in, Javed swings and misses
short ball again, not sure if he expected that so pulls a bit late and misses it
too full on the stumps, he clears his front foot and launches it almost straight down the ground. There is a long-off but he clears him rather easily. Big applause from the UAE dug out
and again the batsman backs away and the bowler pitches it wide outside his reach
looks to go big on the leg side, but it's a slower delivery and goes just past the leg stump
almost in the block hole outside off, he backs away to swing and misses
makes room again, gets it in his zone this time to steer it past point with a horizontal bat for four!
much shorter towards the leg stump, Usman opens up to heave and misses
slower delivery down the leg side, would have been a wide if he had stood his ground but he backs away to slog and misses
he makes room again, backs away too, it's a yorker right on the toes outside leg, he misses and the ball deflects off the boot to the leg side. Usman would have survived had the ball missed the boot
tries the yorker outside off, the batsman gets some bottom edge for a single
short ball, he pulls and gets enough bat to send that to the moon and back! Khurram Manzoor at deep midwicket watches it go well over him for a six!
tries the yorker, gives a low full toss outside off, he drives with hard hands which gets him a thick outside edge through the slips for four
doesn't reach the pitch of the ball which was well outside off, he swings and misses
drives in line with the stumps again, the ball pitches just outside off and holds it line to go to the keeper again
much wider outside off, he chases and misses again. That was very close to being called a wide but the umpire doesn't move
